settings.text-column_text: At Wool.Life, our roots run deep in New Zealand. We are proud to use 100% New Zealand wool, sourced from local farms, to create products that not only enhance your home or garden but also contribute to the wider Kiwi economy.

settings.heading-text-columns_text:
Wool.Life was created with a commitment to support Kiwi farmers by providing non-traditional revenue streams for their wool.

As the demand for synthetic materials has grown, wool has become an undervalued resource.

Our mission is to change that by turning this natural fibre into a sustainable, high-performance product that has a real impact.

settings.image-with-content_text: By choosing Wool.Life, you’re not just buying a product, you’re supporting local businesses and jobs. Our wool is sourced, processed, and manufactured right here in New Zealand, ensuring that the economic benefits of our products stay within the country. Every purchase helps keep rural communities thriving and ensures a sustainable future for New Zealand’s wool industry.

We believe that New Zealand produces some of the finest wool in the world, and we are committed to showcasing this incredible resource through products that combine quality with sustainability. Whether it’s our mulch and weed mats or our wool insulation, everything we produce reflects our pride in being 100% Kiwi-made.

settings.text-column_text: By choosing Wool.Life, you’re helping to support local farmers, strengthen the New Zealand economy, and contribute to a greener, more sustainable future for us all.
